forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun softly dips below the horizon, the still air holds a gentle chill—perfectly in tune with the forecast's promise of a partly cloudy night. Overnight temperatures linger around the low fiftys, inviting those who venture out to don a light jacket or a cozy wrap while the west-southwest wind whispers in from the bay, hinting at the day to come. 

Saturday beckons with mostly sunny skies, though a subtle drop in temperatures to the upper fiftys suggests an atmosphere best appreciated at a leisurely pace. One might stroll along the waterfront or find a quiet corner to read, the clear light illuminating the city’s iconic silhouette. While the forecast hints at a potential marine layer, its presence today seems hinted at rather than tangible; visibility remains sharp, the surroundings painted in soft tones against the backdrop of the Golden Gate. Dress lightly but bring layers to adapt to the brisk breezes from the ocean. Engaging in a casual brunch at a café or exploring the vibrant alleys of the Mission could complement this day, enriching both the palate and the spirit in the embrace of a luminous yet temperate atmosphere.
